text: Moshe Sharoni (, 1929 – 20 September 2020) was a Romanian-born Israeli politician. He was a member of the Knesset for Gil between 2006 and 2009. He was head of the breakaway faction, Justice for the Elderly. Sharoni was born in Buhuși, Romania. Sharoni died on 20 September 2020 at the age of 91.Knesset Member Moshe Sharoni ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Haifa University alumni Category:Israeli political leaders Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Romanian Jews
title: Moshe Sharoni
